vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χρυσό-λῐθος, ὁ,
topaz, [LXX+1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: chrysolite, a name applied by the ancients to all gems of a gold color; specifically the modern topaz, Rev. 21:10*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: crisólito, topacio amarillo (piedra preciosa, de color amarillo-dorado y más valiosa que otros topacios)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 貴橄欖石, 黃寶石 {#啟 21:20|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 贵橄榄石, 黄宝石 {#启 21:20|}
